hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) offered four rak`at in Medina and then two rak`at at Dhul Hulaifa and then passed the night at Dhul-Hulaifa till it was morning and when he mounted his Mount and it stood up, he started to recite Talbiya

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَاتَ بِذِي الْحُلَيْفَةِ حَتَّى أَصْبَحَ
chapter.eng-name: Passing the night in Dhul-Hulaifa till dawn
